```{r include=FALSE}
# Import medicaid encounters
medicaid_encounters_all <- read_rds("D:/Analytic/medicaid_enrollment_categories_encounters_2018_2021_individual_level_all.rds") 

# De-dup (there are a few duplicate bookings) and create booking id for analysis
# Create unique booking id with both individual and booking IDs
medicaid_encounters <- medicaid_encounters_all %>% 
  distinct(unique_person_id, 
           booking_id,
           .keep_all = TRUE) %>% 
  mutate(unique_person_booking_id = paste0(unique_person_id,
                                    booking_id)) 
```
